alert.note: Alert for Hendry; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry and southwestern Palm Beach Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Big Cypress Seminole Reservation to near Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Holey Land Wildlife Refuge and Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
